name: modapp-utils
description: Utility functions used by other modapp packages.

scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist index.js anim.js array.js elem.js obj.js uri.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup src/index.js --config --sourcemap --file dist/modapp-utils.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup src/index.js --config --file dist/modapp-utils.min.js
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run jest
